favors.name: This will help me get reelected.
This will bring jobs... to my state...
This will really help poor people everywhere.
This will help white people.
This will help small businesses.
I need this program to succeed and it needs money.
Subsidy to Music Industry to help my wife's career.
Money for Monsanto means more jobs for my state
We need the Ten Commandments at the state capitol.
Our states are friendly. We should stick together.
Giveaway to corporation but will create some jobs...
Better budget for Veteran Health Care
Westboro Baptist Church wants this bill squashed.
It's not exactly a fair construction bid, but it's more fair than it could be...
Better care for seniors and poor people
Tax break for Union bosses but not the workers.
My state need more money.
Jobs program for welfare recipients.
My rich constituents don't like this tax.
Aid to charity group I own.

endings.content: You were reelected in a landslide. The sky's the limit for you.
You were reelected, but only just. No one could call it a mandate, so you can look forward to a pretty eventless term.
You were reelected, somehow. Everyone hates you, but screw them. You did what you had to to get ahead.
You were not reelected, but you are held as a hero for sticking to your moral beliefs. The next time you run it will be a landslide.
You were not reelected, but you can be proud of an adequate service record and moderate party fame.
You were not reelected. You are a pariah. No one in the party will speak to you, as they know what a snake you are.
You were reelected in a landslide. The sky's the limit for you.

You were not reelected, but you can be proud of an adequate service record and moderate party fame.
You were not reelected. You are a pariah. No one in the party will speak to you, as they know what a snake you are.
